label: Miko, Ladislav.  2015. Taxonomy of European Damaeidae VIII. Contribution to classification of genus Damaeus C. L. Koch, 1835, with a review of Adamaeus Norton, 1978 and  Paradamaeus Bulanova-Zachvatkina, 1957 and redescription of three species. Zootaxa 3980(2): 151–188.
